articles.content: Let's say you already know you want an iPhone, specifically the Pro version. Or maybe you already have an iPhone 11 Pro or 11 Pro Max and are trying to decide whether to trade it in for something fro… [+13805 chars]

articles.author: Cameron Faulkner
articles.title: The Apple Watch SE is $50 off for the first time at Target - The Verge
articles.description: At Target, you can get the 40mm Apple Watch SE for $230, or bump it up to the 44mm size for $260. Both prices are $50 off their normal costs. Also, a few sets of Sony wireless earbuds are cheaper than ever at Amazon.
articles.content:
Plus, get a set of Sony wireless earbuds for just $68
